overview:
Martin’s experience includes more than 15 years in the TMT market, either as executive, consultant or board member. As a trained physicist his main areas of interest are technology and human-computer interaction.

Martin co-founded the mobile ASP MINICK as CTO which he sold to Distefora in 1999/2000. He initiated the LMBO of Distefora Mobile its transformation back to MINICK and trade sale of MINICK to Swisscom in 2006. As executive he managed MINICK’s application and service development from start-up to multinational set up. Currently he hold the position of COO at Montages AG and acts as consultant at Sensational AG, which he co-founded in 2001.

As a start-up enterpreneur Martin takes part in the founding, funding, consulting and development of new startups. He currently serves as chairman at RunMyAccounts.com, member of the board of directors at Cognita AG, SkateRun AG and Tc3 mobile Holdings AG.
